text: @realDonaldTrump Too bad your thumbs couldn’t bring home the 1000’s people stuck abroad in Peru and other countries before it is too late! @SecPompeo @WhiteHouse @USEMBASSYPERU do your jobs!!!! #CoronavirusLockdown #CoronavirusOutbreak #COVID19 #COVIDIDIOTS
